content.label: Hey idiots! Put a #*~¥$&@ undo button in your game!!!!
Title says all.  Love it on Kindle, but I retired the Kindle. No go on iPad.
Very addictive
Kind of a simplified Tetris. Very enjoyable
Fun A+++++

Perfect.
Needs iPhone 6 update.
I enjoy playing slydris and find it quite challenging
Very addictive game , very entertaining.

I prefer to pay for apps so I do not have to deal with ads. I have no freemium apps on my ipad. I never had an ad in Slydris until today. Bye bye 5 stars and wecolme 3 star rating. Get rid of pop up ads and I'll upgrade you back to 5 stars.

It sure is depressing seeing what is happening to the App Store. Paid apps going rogue, freemium taking over, greed, greed, greed.
One of the most addictive games I ever played.
Games good music good. Like a peaceful game play. 5 stars :)

I rarely play games like this. Just can't seem to enjoy myself. I envied people who seemed glued to their screens, lost in the act of playing a simple game.

Then I found this! If I hadn't had this on my iPad mini while sitting in the ER waiting for a friend to finish X-rays and tests, I would have lost my mind! Great app. Grab it and also get Luke's other games. Nice work, great game.

Challenging. Engaging. Although a puzzle mode would probably be a worthy upgrade to the game to assist users in being more precise and intent in their movements to develop techniques. Zen mode is a great way to start off. The short tutorial and the progressive tutorials are fruitful, especially as reminders of the complexities of the game. No debugging problems. Very direct instructions

Can be relaxing, can be played for short periods if wanted, requires some reasoning and it's possible to improve -- all things that make a good puzzle game. My only beef is that when I finally fail to clear the blocks, it shows my final score, but not the level I was able to reach. And there are no historical scores that show me what I just did, achieved or didn't achieve.

This game is better than all the new Tetris-types. It's addictive, thought-provoking, and fun. I don't play the speed version. When I play the "Infinity" I regularly make it to level 47 or so. So, if at all possible, when the game is next updated, could you please allow for starting at more advanced levels instead of just level 30+?  Thanks for the great game. No doubt I've gotten my money's worth.
I play this on my Kindle Fire HD, and on my iPhone.  It works perfectly on both platforms.  Very enjoyable way to pass time.

title.label: Time killing game and really fun

content.label: Really time killing and also fun

title.label: Could be great but imprecise controls make it mediocre

content.label: Like most games of this type as the speed ramps up the controls become less predictable. Pretty fun on the lower levels though.
It's very addicting.

Pretty cool app, different modess and really cool music. I wish the theme song would be an option to play in the game since its the best song... I really like the music, you guys should add more tracks and a shuffle while u play
Great game!  Challenging and addictive, yet simple enough to pick up in just a few minutes.
It's a good game
Just downloaded and tried this. Fun, challenging, excellent, attractive!

This is a very high quality app. The game runs very smooth and is such a challenge to play. It's almost excessively addictive, but you need to catch your breath once you finally bite it. I recommend this to any puzzle style player out there. If you're not a puzzle style player give it a try anyway!
Love the game, pretty addicting from the start!
Nice graphics & controls, worth getting!
Fun game!  Hard to put down!
simple to pick up, hard to master. a puzzler close to perfection. well worth it's money.
The best.
Beautiful, fresh, and challenging puzzler with several modes for added variety. Another winner from Radian.
Exhilarating fun. Fun stuff. And looks cool.
A really fun and original game.
Great game, but sometimes touch is not accurate enough on iphone screen. If you grab the wrong block at the wrong time, it can hose you. Don't let this stop you from trying it.
This is definitely my favorite Tetris type game!!!
Awesome game. Could use a bit more polish on the game play. The one thing I don't like is there is no UNDO in zen mode. If you let go by mistake, there is no way to fix it.
Fun game. Worth the price,
Very smooth gameplay.  Addictive, too, can't stay away!
App gets stuck on 6th level.  Very disappointed.
Pick this game up. It's a lot of fun!
I bought this game for Mac. But I wanted it on the go, so I bought it twice. It's that good.
I was just going to try it. An hour later... Lots of fun, good game!
Fun puzzle app, good music, graphics, and enough variety of game play to keep things interesting.

Bought it after reading reviews, opened and thought "Oh no! Just like Tetris!". But after playing it I knew this was a far better challenge and WAY more fun. You think out a strategy instead of just reacting to falling pieces. But it and enjoy.
I like the fact that there's no time limit which really gives the game a unique twist that is more contemplative than frenzied
I wondered if this game would be worth two fillers, but it totally is.  I found it challenging yet fun.  Every few levels, a new element enters the game making it very interesting.
This game is quite the rush. Game modes are all fantastic, love he color variances, huge combos with slow motion affects, really great overall puzzle action!
A good casual puzzler which puts to mind a game like Tetris, except as a game more suited to a touch screen and the casual driven nature of a smart phone.
This looks really simple to play and it is, but there is a lot of depth and strategy to it.  Also, the presentation is really great.  This will be on my playlist for a long time.
Could use game center leader boards.

Fantastically made game! Wonderful looking UI and menus.

Great puzzler gameplay. it's easy to understand, but difficult to apply well
